_source.short_desc: Cloud-based donation management software that tracks all of your nonprofit's data. Includes forms, mass email, and QB integration.
_source.long_desc: Discover why thousands of nonprofits have trusted DonorSnap for over a decade. DonorSnap is an all-in-one donor management software. Save countless administrative hours with time-saving tools and integrations. Take your fundraising to the next level with robust reporting and communication tools. Pricing starts at $39 per month. Try DonorSnap with your own data risk-free for 30 days.
_source.pricing_details:
Free trial for 30 days.

Site setup $200 (one-time fee) then:
1,000 contacts: $39 per month
2,500 contacts: $59 per month
5,000 contacts: $79 per month
10,000 contacts: $99 per month
30,000 contacts: $199 per month

(Annual payments receive a price break)
_source.target_audience: DonorSnap serves nonprofits of all type, shape, and size. The system can be easily customized to suit the needs of almost any organization. We'll let you know if DonorSnap won't work well for you.

media.caption: Easily access the data you need with customizable dashboard apps
Built in reports you can schedule to send out

related_products.short_desc: Bloomerang's donor management software helps fundraisers save more time, raise more funds, and do more good.
related_products.features:
Bloomerang helps nonprofits deliver a better giving experience so they can save time, raise more funds, and create lasting change. With our donor management software, you'll have access to: 

- Email Marketing Tools
- Letters & Mailings Templates
- An Integrations Hub
- Online Giving Pages & Forms
- Peer-to-Peer Fundraising Tools
- Reporting & Analytics
- Automatic Data Updates

related_products.short_desc: Church management solution that offers processing donations, managing memberships, planning services, scheduling volunteers, and more.
related_products.features: Planning Center is a set of seven online software products designed to help you find freedom to focus on what matters in your ministry. You can subscribe to individual products, or use them all together as a full church management system. We have tools to help you manage your membership database, schedule volunteers, plan services, check people in, take signups, process online donations, manage your calendar and facilities, and coordinate small groups. Every plan includes full access to support.

related_products.short_desc: DonorPerfect organizes all your constituent data in one unified database. It has easy to use tools that help you raise more money.
related_products.features: Thousands of nonprofits use DonorPerfect's all-in-one software solution to manage their fundraising activities and donor management.  DonorPerfect offers a variety of fully integrated programs for every type of eCheck and credit card processing, including one-time gifts, automatic collection of preauthorized recurring pledge payments and online payments.  Perfect for annual appeals, grant tracking, capital campaigns, online fundraising, special events, contact management and more.

related_products.short_desc: Donor management software includes donor profiles, contributions, online giving, email or printed statements, pledging and more.
related_products.features: Servant Keeper will help you quickly and easily manage and communicate with your donors. Entering and managing many donors giving to multiple funds is a breeze and you will love how easy it is to email or mail end of year giving statements.  You can even let your donors download their own statements. Split contributions, recurring giving, pledging, online giving, text to give - do it all! We can convert your current donors and transactions!  Get your free demo and watch the donor overview video!

related_products.short_desc: Donor management software that makes it easy to keep track of your donors, donations and pledges.
related_products.features: "Save time and get more done, with fewer headaches." Easily keep track of your donors, donations and pledges - starts at $47.98 (one-time cost, no monthly fees; no accounting or payroll) Record source/motivation codes for each donation. Send out personalized letters, emails and text messages for fundraising. Issue yearly tax receipts or one with each donation.  Print receipts or send them by email as encrypted PDFs.  Share data like web-based software but without any monthly fee. PC or Mac.

related_products.short_desc: Thousands of small nonprofits rely on Network for Good's simple and smart fundraising software to cultivate relationships with donors a
related_products.features:
Reach your fundraising goals, connect with supporters, and advance your mission with Network for Good's all-in-one fundraising software.

Built for small and growing nonprofits, only Network for Good is designed to help you become a better fundraiser.

Get donor management, powerful communication tools, online fundraising features, and more-all in one integrated software. Plus, our best-in-class onboarding, customer service, and data migration are always included.

related_products.short_desc: Manage offline & online donations and donor interactions with Neon CRM? plus features like automated donation receipting & reporting.
related_products.features:
Neon CRM is a cloud-based fundraising and donor management database designed to build and support lasting relationships. Track all your offline & online donations along with your donor interactions and receive features like automated donation receipting, reporting, and more.

Create more effective campaign emails, define your email audiences, and manage direct mail appeals out of one single, unified fundraising and donor management software. Ready for a better donor management solution?

related_products.short_desc: Mobilize your church with software that blends best ministry practices with latest technology to effectively reach and disciple people.
related_products.features: For pastors who want to use today's tech but don't have IT pros on staff. We cover all the basics (membership, communication, groups, giving) and advanced (check-in, volunteers, registration, workflow automation) features you need to keep all your people data in one place. Online giving is beautiful at the lowest price in the industry. Text-to-Church makes giving, registration, check-in, digital connection cards, links to anywhere, access to my stuff with a text. Now with 2 way text to chat!

related_products.short_desc: GiveGab is the #1 digital fundraising solution for Giving Days and year-round giving. Experience the JOY of fundraising with GiveGab!
related_products.features:
GiveGab is becoming Bonterra. Learn more at www.bonterratech.com.

GiveGab is the #1 digital solution for Giving Days and year-round fundraising tailored to nonprofit networks, community foundations, education institutions, hospital foundations, and public media outlets. GiveGab provides a modern and secure platform built on technology inspired by the feedback of our customers, resulting in products and features tailored to the most popular requests of our partners.

related_products.short_desc: Auctria: a budget friendly web solution to run your entire event from tickets to receipts; traditional auctions or online fundraisers.
related_products.features: Auctria makes live, silent, online, virutal, hybrid auction & event fundraisers easy & affordable for groups large and small. Handle ticket sales, bids, purchases & donations. Track donors & items.  Produce printed forms as needed. Integrated credit card processing optional & accept online donations. Mobile and text-based bidding available. Completely transparent pricing with no performance fees. Explore our demo or get started with a free account to try it out.

related_products.short_desc: Fundraising solution that helps you communicate with your constituents and make better decisions.
related_products.features: Raisers Edge NXT is a smart, cloud fundraising solution built to help nonprofits achieve sustainable growth. It's a total solution that includes all the tools needed to be successful on one platform and one simple subscription price. This includes data enrichment services, event management, and social and email marketing tools, online donations, flexible reporting and actionable analytics.  Raisers Edge NXT pulls together your processes and people to move your entire mission forward.

similar_products.short_desc: DonorPerfect organizes all your constituent data in one unified database. It has easy to use tools that help you raise more money.
similar_products.features: Thousands of nonprofits use DonorPerfect's all-in-one software solution to manage their fundraising activities and donor management.  DonorPerfect offers a variety of fully integrated programs for every type of eCheck and credit card processing, including one-time gifts, automatic collection of preauthorized recurring pledge payments and online payments.  Perfect for annual appeals, grant tracking, capital campaigns, online fundraising, special events, contact management and more.

similar_products.features:

- Letters & Mailings Templates
- An Integrations Hub

- Peer-to-Peer Fundraising Tools
- Reporting & Analytics
- Automatic Data Updates

similar_products.short_desc: Thousands of small nonprofits rely on Network for Good's simple and smart fundraising software to cultivate relationships with donors a
similar_products.features:
Reach your fundraising goals, connect with supporters, and advance your mission with Network for Good's all-in-one fundraising software.

Built for small and growing nonprofits, only Network for Good is designed to help you become a better fundraiser.

Get donor management, powerful communication tools, online fundraising features, and more-all in one integrated software. Plus, our best-in-class onboarding, customer service, and data migration are always included.

similar_products.short_desc: Manage offline & online donations and donor interactions with Neon CRM? plus features like automated donation receipting & reporting.
similar_products.features:
Neon CRM is a cloud-based fundraising and donor management database designed to build and support lasting relationships. Track all your offline & online donations along with your donor interactions and receive features like automated donation receipting, reporting, and more.

Create more effective campaign emails, define your email audiences, and manage direct mail appeals out of one single, unified fundraising and donor management software. Ready for a better donor management solution?

similar_products.short_desc: With Kindful, you can amplify your fundraising, simplify your donor management, and maximize your impact.
similar_products.features: Kindful's fundraising and donor management software will help you understand your donors like never before. Kindful helps you build deeper relationships with your donors and keeps you from wasting time on administrative tasks. Kindful provides donor management, fundraising tools, donor communication, tracking & reporting, and more! You're changing the world, and you should be able to rely on partners who are not only experts in their field but who also care about your mission.

similar_products.short_desc: EveryAction - a unified nonprofit CRM solution built to increase efficiency, optimize multichannel fundraising, & advance your mission.
similar_products.features: Get more from and do more with your donor data. EveryAction's unified CRM and donation management software gives you a 360-degree view of your donors, empowering you to run automated, personalized, omni-channel fundraising campaigns by managing online and offline fundraising from the same, powerful platform. With best-in-class fundraising, membership, advocacy, and analytics tools built and supported by nonprofit experts, EveryAction enables organizations of all sizes to advance their missions.

similar_products.short_desc: Virtuous is the only nonprofit CRM & responsive fundraising platform designed to help nonprofit teams build better donor relationships.
similar_products.features: Much more than CRM, Virtuous is the only responsive fundraising platform and your growth partner -- unifying fundraising and development activities, ridding teams of redundant back-office tasks, and surfacing the insights needed to deliver dynamic donor experiences at scale. Giving is deeply personal. We believe fundraising should be too, and technology partners should help nonprofit teams create responsive experiences that build better donor relationships and increase impact with confidence.

similar_products.short_desc:
Funraise provides donation management tech to build your nonprofit's movement & make enterprise-size impact. 

Get started for Free!
similar_products.features:
Funraise provides exceptional, friendly digital fundraising technology. Built with innovation and nonprofit experience, Funraise's state-of-the-art donation management tools integrate every critical aspect of fundraising management into a single platform, making it fun to create lasting impact with nonprofit-first technology. Experience why organizations like United Nations HCR and National Wildlife Federation trust Funraise to power their fundraising. 

Because your cause is our cause.

similar_products.short_desc: Eleo is designed with new and seasoned fundraisers in mind.
similar_products.features:
Eleo is designed for new and seasoned fundraisers. Complete with every feature, integration, and report you need to build strong relationships with your donors. Send effective communications and analyze your fundraising efforts.  Eleo comes equipped with event, volunteer, membership and grant modules.

Pricing starts at $39/month for up to 2,500 contacts and includes live support, trainings, data import, & more.

similar_products.short_desc: With ParishSOFT Giving, you can receive donations from any Internet-enabled device, including desktops and smartphones.
similar_products.features: More than 10,000 churches use ParishSOFT Giving to help close the contribution gap, reduce paperwork and shredding, and give you back time in your busy day. With ParishSOFT second-generation online giving platform, parishioners can set up one-time donations online or set up recurring gifts with ease.

similar_products.short_desc: Aegis Premier Technologies nonprofit CRM solution will help you manage your donors and maximize your fundraising efforts.
similar_products.features: Aegis CRM provides all of the donor management and fundraising tools you need to help plan and execute your fundraising campaigns. With a 99% guaranteed uptime, our state-of-the-art platform utilizes best practices in data security, load balancing, and disaster recovery, to ensure your data is being safeguarded at all times.

similar_products.short_desc: Keela is a fundraising CRM that unifies fundraising and donor communications.
similar_products.features:
Keela is a fundraising CRM that unifies fundraising and donor communications. Keela's uniquely powerful solution bridges the gap between fundraising and comms, allowing nonprofits to improve donor relations through targeted, multi-channel approaches. 

Keela's platform allows you to pull critical donor information directly from your CRM into your donor communications, so you know who to ask for a donation, the best time to ask them, and the perfect amount to ask for.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Association Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Association Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Association Management software automates management functions including fundraising, membership, event management and other operations. These software packages typically offer many features to empower and inform association members, as well as administration and business process tools for association managers. Associations use these applications to communicate with their constituents, share resources, promote events, collect fees and recruit new members. Association Management software is related to Membership Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Church Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Church Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Church Management software handles functions such as accounting, donation tracking, service attendance, membership, schedules and activities. Churches use these applications to automate and organize administrative functions including document creation, outreach and event scheduling. Management software helps churches better track resources and foster communication among administrators as well as staff, ministry leaders, members and visitors. Church Management software is related to Fund Accounting software, Fundraising software and Membership Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fund Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fund Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fund Accounting software automates accounting and portfolio management functions for nonprofit organizations, alternative asset managers, private bankers, foundations and government agencies. Fund administrators utilize these applications to assist in strategic decision making and to increase accountability across an organization's financial operations. Fund Accounting software also assists with regulatory compliance management and financial reporting on portfolio performance. Fund Accounting software is related to Accounting software and Government software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fundraising software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fundraising tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fundraising software manages donor and pledge information associated with fundraising campaigns. Development professionals use Fundraising applications to enhance their ability to locate, manage and grow donor sources. Fundraising software facilitates cost effective targeting of likely donors, tracks pledges, and manages contributions and donor relationship management. These applications also provide a variety of tools allowing fundraisers to track the effectiveness of their development campaigns. Fundraising software is related to Church Management software, Event Management software and Political Campaign software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Membership Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Membership Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Membership Management software automates the management of membership within associations, communities ,and other member-based organizations. These software packages typically offer many features to empower and inform group members as well as administration and business process tools for organizations. A variety of membership-oriented groups use these software applications to communicate with their constituents, share resources, promote events, and collect fees as well as to recruit and retain members. Membership Management software is related to Association Management software, Church Management software and Club Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Nonprofit software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Nonprofit tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Nonprofit software automates all aspects of nonprofit operations from database management, to fundraising, to accounting and CRM. Nonprofit software is related to Donation Management software and Nonprofit Accounting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Political Campaign software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Political Campaign tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Political Campaign software provides financial and management tools, contribution tracking, a voter database, and other features to help political candidates and PACs more effectively manage campaigns. Campaign managers use these software applications to efficiently identify likely donors, target voters for outreach efforts, manage volunteers, track contributions, and assess the effectiveness of campaigns. Political Campaign software also typically offers demographic and voter behavior data, polling tools, call center integration and other campaign management necessities such as regulatory compliance monitoring. Political Campaign software is related to Fundraising software.

_source.features_tokenized_text: campaign_management donation_tracking donor_management event_management gift_matching_management mobile_giving online_giving payment_processing pledge_management receipt_management recurring_giving

pricing_plans.name: Up to 1,000 Contacts
pricing_plans.description: With this plan, companies get a database with up to 1,000 contacts and all the features as the rest of the plans. Additionally,  two private trainings, email support, complete access to the help site, video library, and weekly training webinars are included.
